categoryBlurb: Looking for the perfect gift for the man who has everything? At GiftStarter, we know that it can be a challenge when it comes to finding the perfect gift for your dad or brother or best friend. Whether it’s for a birthday, anniversary, or just because... it’s time to bring everyone together to get a bigger, better gift. And we can help. To make it easy, we have curated our favorite ideas for group gifting for the man in your life.  Let them know from their community of family and friends how special they are with a group gift from GiftStarter.

productList.productDescription:
Not meant for the Sunday driver, the Motor Oil is designed for the rocker in all of us. The double-humbucker configuration is built for overdrive. Whether you rock like the British Invasion or the Sunset Strip, the Motor Oil is as gentle as a chainsaw.


THE SPECS


Model: Motor Oil!
Body: Recycled metal hollow body w/ removable back panel. Basswood frame for increased amplification and structural integrity
Neck Wood: Maple
Neck type: Bohemian Through-Body
Fretboard: Rosewood
Headstock: Red
Finish: Golden Glaze
Frets: 21
Nut Width: 1 3/4"
Width at 12th Fret: 2 1/8"
Width at 21st Fret: 2 3/8"
Neck Thickness: 7/8"
Scale Length: 25 1/2"
Hardware: Chrome
Tuners: 3R 3L screw in w/ removable keys
Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-Matic
Pickups: Humbucker, Humbucker
Electronics: Volume, Tone
Switch: 3-way toggle
Self-standing: This model has a built in stand made from recycled rubber.
Inspired by South Africa. Designed in Atlanta. Produced in China.


Learn more here: https://www.bohemianguitars.com/bohemian-motor-oil-electric-guitar


Video: https://youtu.be/3cSLKoAfv6U
productList.productMetaDescription: Bohemian Guitar is designed for the rocker in all of us, built for over drive, and as gentle as a chainsaw. The perfect gift.

productList.productDescription:
The Classic Nomiku's power, size, and safety features makes it the essential kitchen tool to bring the magic of sous vide into your kitchen.  


Clips onto any pot you own
Simple to use; just one knob and one screen to set the temperature
Lightweight and compact for use with one hand and easy storage
Use Tender to find and share recipes with the largest sous vide community
US ETL approved


What is sous vide?


Sous vide is the method of cooking vacuum-sealed food in a controlled low-temperature water bath. It is a top chef's secret weapon because it allows you to craft consistently delicious, perfectly cooked dishes, effortlessly and consistently. 


Learn more here: http://www.nomiku.com/products/nomiku-sous-vide
productList.productMetaDescription: Nomiku is the essential kitchen tool to bring the magic of sous vide to your kitchen + makes the perfect gift!

productList.productName: Weber® Spirit E210 Liquid Propane Gas Grill
productList.productSlug: Weber Spirit E210 Liquid Propane Gas Grill
productList.productDescription: This is Weber’s grill completely re-imagined, and the proof is visible in features throughout the grill. With the control panel moved to the front, two stainless steel tables fold down to allow for maneuverability and easy storage – a boon for grillers with small patios, decks or balconies. While compact, the grill is also roomy enough to cook a 20-pound turkey or roast meats and vegetables at the same time.  Porcelain-enameled cast-iron cooking grates offer superior heat retention and quick clean up, and the porcelain-enameled shroud will not fade, peel or rust.  This is a must-have gift for any guy who loves good food and company.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Weber Spirit E210 Liquid Propane Gas Grill

productList.productName: Sony PlayStation 4 Four Games, One Pick Bundle
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS

  • AMD Radeon Graphics Core Next Engine
  • 8GB of GDDR5 RAM, 500GB Hard Drive
  • AMD Jaguar Eight-Core Processor
  • 10/100/1000 Mbps Gigabit Ethernet
  • 11b/g/n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 2.1+EDR
  • Blu-ray Disc Player
  • DualShock 4 Wireless Controller
  • Remote Play with PlayStation Vita
  • PlayStation Plus Membership Support
  • One Game Voucher for Digital Download

Get the next generation gaming experience with this Sony PlayStation 4 Four Games, One Pick Bundle. In addition to the PlayStation console and a DualShock 4 wireless controller, you'll get one game voucher for digital download. Choose between Destiny, NBA 2K15, LittleBigPlanet 3, or Far Cry 4. All four games vary in ratings so please check before you choose one.

Please note that you will only be able to choose ONE of the four games. It will be provided in the form of a game voucher for digital download. Internet access will be required to download the game you choose.

The Sony PlayStation 4 Gaming Console ushers in an era of next generation gaming. Providing dynamic and connected gaming, powerful performance, high definition graphics, deeply integrated social capabilities, and innovative second-screen features, the PlayStation 4 allows you to game as you see fit. With immersive game play, access to your favorite digital entertainment apps, and PlayStation exclusives, the PlayStation 4 centers around you, the gamer. Play when, where, and how you want.

Broadband Internet required to download game using the included Download Voucher. Users are responsible for broadband access and usage fees. Additional charges can apply for online content.

The PlayStation's graphics processing unit (GPU) contains a unified array of 18 Compute Units, which collectively generate 1.84 teraflops of processing power that can be applied freely to graphics, simulation tasks, or a mixture of the two. The PlayStation 4 is also equipped with 8GB of unified system memory, easing game creation and increasing the richness of content achievable. High-speed GDDR5 is used for the memory, giving the system a total of 176 GB/s of bandwidth and providing a further boost to graphics performance.

Personalized, Curated Content

The PlayStation 4 has the ability to learn your preferences. It will gauge your likes and dislikes and suggest content to match them. This allows you to discover content specifically tailored to you. It can even download and install content on your console. Search for games in your favorite genres or by your favorite game developers. You can also look over game-related information shared by your friends, view your friends' gameplay, or get recommendations for content, such as games, TV shows, and movies.

Play as You Download

Spend less time waiting and more time playing with the PlayStation 4. When you purchase a game that is enabled with this feature, the PlayStation 4 downloads the core content so you can start playing as soon as possible. While you're playing, the PlayStation 4 downloads the rest of the game in the background.

Remote Play

Remote Play on the PlayStation 4 fully unlocks the PlayStation Vita's potential, making it the ultimate companion device. With the PlayStation Vita, you will be able to play a range of PlayStation 4 titles on the PlayStation Vita's 5" display over a Wi-Fi network. The PlayStation Vita is sold separately.

PlayStation App

The PlayStation App will enable iOS and Android smartphones and tablets to become second screens for the PlayStation 4. Once installed on these devices, players can view in game items, purchase PlayStation 4 games, download PlayStation 4 games directly to the console at home, and even watch the gameplay of other gamers remotely.

DualShock 4 Wireless Controller

The included DualShock 4 wireless controller features familiar controls from its predecessor, the DualShock 3, while also introducing innovative ways to interact with games and other players. Improved dual analog sticks and trigger buttons offer precise control while the capacitive touch pad provides a unique way of interacting with games. The Share button allows you to share your gameplay over social media.

Please note that a PlayStation Plus membership is required for online multiplayer. It is not included with the PlayStation 4 and must be purchased separately.
productList.productMetaDescription: The Sony PlayStation 4 Four Games, One Pick Bundle, is an awesome group gift idea for the gamer that will appreciate starting off their new console with a digital download voucher to choose from 4 popular games- Destiny, NBA 2K15, LittleBigPlanet 3, or Far Cry 4.

productList.productDescription:
Recreate the action and adventure of the Star Wars™ movies with the ultimate Death Star playset! This detailed battle station is awesome as it features an incredible array of minifigure-scale scenes, moving parts, characters and accessories from Episodes IV and VI on its multiple decks, including the Death Star control room, rotating turbolaser turrets, hangar bay with TIE Advanced starfighter, tractor beam controls, Emperor’s throne room, detention block, firing laser cannon, Imperial conference chamber, droid maintenance facility, and the powerful Death Star superlaser…plus much more! Swing across the chasm with Luke and Leia, face danger in the trash compactor, and duel with Darth Vader for the fate of the entire galaxy!

This is the perfect gift for the guy that loves to build and/or is a big Star Wars fan. Ideal for men that are engineers, architects, teachers, mechanics, and just plain love to build.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter LEGO Star Wars Death Star

productList.productDescription: The TRX® FORCE Kit is the most innovative and hardcore suspension trainer released by TRX.  The FORCE Kit features the practical durable  materials to make it very useful  in any situation. On top of its advanced design, the TRX FORCE Kit includes real life extensive 12-week progressive training program and workouts used by the US Military, first responders, MMA fighters and more!  Each TRX FORCE Kit includes the upgraded Tactical Suspension Trainer, training program, workout DVD, military fitness guide, door anchor, carry bag (that doubles as a backpack), TRX Xtender, door placard and TRX Suspension Anchor.  This is the ultimate fitness junkie’s gear and kit to get them into tip to shape in any season.

productList.productName: Fitbit® Surge™ GPS Watch + Heart Rate Monitor
productList.productDescription:
While looking like a designer watch that you can wear with pride on your wrist, this super-charged activity tracker logs fitness stats, monitors your heart rate and sleep, and controls your tunes—progress has never looked so good. Great gift of health and wellness for both the fitness junkie and anyone in your life that aims to get into shape.

What’s great is that Fitbit is a great social tool that allows family and friends to encourage each other with cheers.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Fitbit Surge GPS Watch + Heart Rate Monitor

productList.productName: Single Malt Scotch - Glendronach 18 year old Allardice Single Malt Whisky 750ml
productList.productDescription: Single malt distilleries are popping up across America, as bourbon whiskey is on the rise and this year marked the first time that none of the top five whiskies in Jim Murray’s “Whiskey Bible” came from Scotland. There an increasing, quality competition in the world of whiskey. Mellow and rich, no liquor is quite as luxurious and masculine as single malt scotch. Aged in "the finest" Oloroso sherry butts, the Glendronach 18 year is the darkest and most dense of the three standard expressions. Loaded with spice cake and dark toffee on the nose, the palate follows through with all of the flavor without ever going over the top. It's fudgy and loaded with dried fruit on the backend, showcasing everything you're looking for something like Macallan 18, albeit for $90 less per bottle.  Need we say more?
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Single Malt Scotch - Glendronach 18 year old Allardice Single Malt Whisky 750ml

productList.productDescription:
Everything about a Mancrate screams manliness, so you can’t go wrong in gifting a wooden crate full of grilling gear. It even come with a laser-etched crowbar. No bow, no ribbons, no fluff, and absolutely no instructions. This will make him a true grill master. Complete with Himalayan Salt Plate (8" x 8" x 1.5"), 70 Recipe Salt Block Cookbook, Circle Kabobs, and 4 Mini-Thermometers (2 chicken, 2 steak). In addition it includes. storage & carrier tote bag, 3 in 1 scraper, black grilling glove and foldable spatula.

This is the gift for the man who loves to grill or plans to pick up a new grilling hobby.

productList.productName: Crock-Pot® Smart Wifi-Enabled WeMo 6-Quart Slow Cooker, SCCPWM600-V1
productList.productDescription: This might seem like a more appropriate gift for your mom than for a guy, but men need to know how to cook, too!  This is perfect for a single dad, or for the recent college grad who needs a little help figuring out that whole “cooking without starting a grease fire” thing.  Using a Crock-Pot is practically idiot-proof.  Just throw all your ingredients before you go to work, and you come home to a hot meal.  This has a cool tech aspect as well for the gadget geeks. You can adjust cooking time, temperature, shift to warm, or turn off entirely using the smartphone app.  Drop in the ingredients in the morning, and use a smartphone to turn it on so a warm meal is ready when you walk in the door.  Perfect!
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Crock-Pot Smart Wifi-Enabled WeMo 6-Quart Slow Cooker, SCCPWM600-V1

productList.productDescription: The Spencer Marston Potenza pool table is the ultimate fusion of style and value. Its tapered legs, hand rubbed satin walnut finish and espresso leather shield pockets emit a luxury well beyond its price point.  The Potenza remains one of the most popular pool table models due to its timeless design and all hardwood construction. The pool table is tournament ready and built to last a lifetime.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter SPENCER Marston Potenza Pool Table

productList.productName: Words Of Wisdom Print By The Dalai Lama
productList.productDescription: A centering quote from the Dalai Lama, printed on luan plywood and hand framed in recycled pine. Made by Rebecca Puig in USA. 24"W x 2"D x 36"H.

productList.productName: Fits Like A Glove iPad Case
productList.productNameShort: Fits Like A Glove iPad Case
productList.productDescription: Made from the same type of leather used in crafting professional-grade baseball mitts. American steerhide with bengaline lining. Tab closure. USA. Catalog exclusive. 7-1/2"W x 3/4"D x 9-3/4"H, holds iPad or iPad Air.
productList.imageAltText: Fits Like A Glove iPad Case

productList.productName: Filson Tin Cloth Cruiser - Alaska Fit
productList.productDescription: Filson’s classic Cruiser, made of abrasion- and wind-resistant, water-repellent Tin Cloth. With a reinforced yoke and arms, snap-adjustable cuffs and multiple pockets, it's perfect for use in the field when the weather is unpredictable. FEATURES: Snap-front closure, 4 utility pockets, 1 slotted patch pocket, 1 patch pocket, 2 handwarmer pockets, dual-access rear map pocket, 1 interior utility pocket, adjustable snap-closure cuffs, reinforced arms and yoke for added protection, Classic Cruiser multi-pocket design, wind- and abrasion-resistant, water-repellent fabric.
A soft-sided, insulated cooler with rustproof hardware.
Lightweight, rolling carry-on with U-zipper for full access.

Patagonia decided the wheel was a pretty good invention after all, so they added two of them to their rugged Black Hole bags and created this super burly, smooth-rolling duffel. Highly weather-resistant, it will protect your gear from rough handling and hold everything you need for an extended trip. Its main compartment is accessed by a zippered U-shaped lid, which has a pair of zippered mesh pockets on the underside to hold small items. A zippered exterior pocket provides a secure, easy-access place for your boarding pass, energy bar or paperback. The sturdy frame sheet protects the duffel from baggage-handler abuse and keeps your Black Hole upright, even when it’s loaded to the max. Oversized wheels deliver a smooth ride, whether you’re crossing the tarmac or following a cobblestone street. Carrying options include the main webbing handles (with snap closure), a telescoping handle or the two haul loops on either end. You can lash additional gear to the outside with the four corner-mounted daisy chains. Made from 14.7-oz 1,200-denier polyester (50% solution-dyed) with a TPU-film laminate and a DWR (durable water repellent) finish.

productList.productName: Patagonia Men’s Skeena River Waders – Regular
productList.productDescription: Whether you’re scrambling up small, high-gradient freestones or doing the cast-step-mend steelhead dance in deep water, Patagonia’s Skeena River Waders strike an ideal balance between lightweight and tough. These highly versatile fly-fishing waders are built from varying weights of tough 4-layer polyester microfiber with their proprietary waterproof/breathable H2No® barrier and NanoSphere® DWR (durable water repellent) finish. Single Seam Construction (SSC) increases durability and freedom of movement. They’re also loaded with fishing-friendly features: waist-mounted EZ-Lock suspenders easily convert from chest to waist height and provide quick relief without having to remove your jacket; internal, welded-TPU waterproof pocket keeps camera or phone dry; chest handwarmer pockets with water-resistant zips protect your off hand from the elements; additional upper storage pockets and 100% nylon utility keeper secure essential tools. The custom-fit left and right booties are made from 3mm neoprene with abrasion-resistant soles. Field repair kit included.

More fun. All in One. Play games together with your friends on a network powered by over 300,000 servers for maximum performance. Find new challengers who fit your skill and style with Smart Match, which uses intelligent algorithms to bring the right players together. Turn your best game moments into personalized movies that you can share with friends, or broadcast your gameplay live. You can also switch quickly to apps, and connect with family and friends with Skype in HD. Or do two things at once by snapping a game, live TV, a movie or apps side-by-side.** Processor 8-core x86 processor lets you instantly switch between a game and your favorite entertainment apps with ease. HDMI pass-through Connect your cable or satellite box and watch TV through your Xbox One, which makes switching inputs seem almost pre-historic.** Memory 8GB of RAM and a 500GB*** hard drive give you plenty of memory for your games, demos, movies, apps, music, and more. Optical drive Watch movies and play games in crystal-clear HD with the Xbox One's Blu-ray capabilities.

productList.productName: Canon EOS 70D DSLR Camera with 18-135mm STM f/3.5-5.6 Lens
productList.productNameShort: Canon EOS DSLR Camera with Lens
productList.productDescription:
The Canon EOS 70D DSLR Camera features a 20.2 megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor and DIGIC 5+ image processor to ensure high-resolution images and excellent low-light sensitivity. Both the sensor and processor work together to produce well-detailed, clear imagery that exhibits natural tonality and color gradations with minimal noise when working in difficult lighting conditions. The processor also provides notable speed throughout the camera system, including the ability to record up to 7 fps in full-resolution, quickened AF speeds, and full HD 1080p video recording in multiple frame rates with manual exposure and audio level control.

If you would like more product information, rebate information, or any other questions, please contact the Gift Concierge.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Canon EOS 70D DSLR Camera with 18-135mm STM f/3.5-5.6 Lens

productList.productName: Nintendo 3DS XL Handheld Gaming System 2015 Version
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS
-Face-Tracking 3D
-Compatible with Most DS Games
-Access to the Nintendo eShop
-4.88” Top 3D Widescreen LCD Display
-4.18” Bottom LCD Touchscreen
-Wireless Connectivity for Multiplayer
-MicroSDHC Media Card Slot
-Built-in amiibo Support
-C-Stick, ZL & ZR Button
-Includes Stylus & 4GB SDHC Card
-Achieve total immersion with dual large screens and 3D graphics with the black 2015 version of the 3DS XL Handheld Gaming System from Nintendo.

The Nintendo 3DS is compatible with all 3DS and eShop games, as well as most DS and DSi games. Also, certain future releases will only be available on this Nintendo 3DS XL 2015 model. Designed for the family, the Nintendo 3DS XL has a 3D depth slider, a 3D camera, face-tracking 3D capabilities, StreetPass, SpotPass, wireless connectivity, and even access to the Miiverse online community.

Note: AC Adapter is not included. You can use any Nintendo 3DS, 2DS, 3DS XL, or DSi charger with the new Nintendo 3DS XL.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Nintendo 3DS XL Handheld Gaming System 2015 Version

productList.productName: Numark NS7FX Motorized DJ Software Controller for Serato ITCH Software
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS
-Includes Numark NSFX Effects Controller
-Includes Numark NS7 DJ Controller
-Complete Controller Workstation
-Direct-Drive Motorized Platters
-7” Vinyl and Slipmats
-Integrated Mixer and USB Interface
-Replaceable VCA Faders
-Strip-Search Touch Strip
-Audiophile Standard Circuitry and Sound
-Includes Serato ITCH Software

The Numark NS7FX Motorized DJ Software Controller with Effects conveniently combines the NS7 controller and NSFX effects controller in one package. The NS7 is an intuitive all-in-one workstation and USB interface for use with Serato ITCH DJ software (included). Numark's attention to detail makes the NS7 a viable solution for laptop DJs who crave the look and feel of traditional vinyl DJ rigs; without the bulk and hassle of separate components, arduous setup, etc. A traditional 2-channel DJ mixer with replaceable VCA crossfader and level faders also serves as the USB interface. There are balanced XLR and unbalanced RCA phono analog output connections, and an RCA (L/R) input for connecting line-devices such as drum machines, MP3 players, etc. Two direct-drive motorized platters surround the mixer (like any traditional DJ setup), and feature 7” vinyl on top of actual slipmats for an authentic analog turntable feel. The motor's torque may be adjusted to reflect modern or traditional turntable feel, and of course the platters are sensitive for scratching, back-cuing, etc. Each deck also features Numark's Strip-Search touch strip for accurate, turntablist-style needle-dropping.

All this in a package that also includes Serato ITCH DJ software for the Mac and Windows OS; simply add the laptop and you'll be playing your set in no time.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Numark NS7FX Motorized DJ Software Controller for Serato ITCH Software

productList.productName: Native Instruments TRAKTOR KONTROL S4 MK2
productList.productDescription:
PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS
-Aircraft-Grade Aluminum Jogwheels
-Color-Coded RGB Indicator Buttons
-Works with TRAKTOR DJ iPad/iPhone App
-Flux Mode Buttons for Each Deck
-+18 dBu Balanced 1/4” Outputs
-Four Mix Channels and One Loop Channel
-Includes TRAKTOR PRO 2 with Remix Decks
-Built-in 24-bit/96 kHz Audio Interface
-Microphone Input with Gain and Mute
-Charges iPad or iPhone While You DJ

The Native Instruments TRAKTOR KONTROL S4 MK2 is designed for DJs and electronic music performers that use TRAKTOR DJ or TRAKTOR PRO 2 software. The updated controller now features aircraft-grade aluminum jog wheel plates, improved fader reliability, RGB color coded buttons for visual feedback when triggering cue points, samples, and loops, as well as full support for the iPad and iPhone TRAKTOR DJ application.

The unit consists of a three components: a software controller that mirrors the control interface of TRAKTOR PRO 2 DJ software, a 4-channel mixer plus loop recording with 3-band EQ, filter knobs, gain, and two FX sends per channel, and a Cirrus Logic AD/DA audio interface with 24-bit 96/kHz resolution.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter Native Instruments TRAKTOR KONTROL S4 MK2

productList.productDescription: The Parrot MiniDrone Jumping Sumo is a super cool, two-wheeled rover with a camera that streams live video for piloting through an intuitive smartphone or tablet app. The camera can also capture low-res photos and video and can jump over 2.5 feet high and always falls back on its wheels, making it almost idiot proof. Comes with a wide angle camera and and Lithium-Polymer battery, rechargeable and removable, lasts up to 20 minutes and full recharge in 1 hour.  For the gadget affectionado, this is a gift that will have him excited.

Sometimes the widescreen TV isn’t big enough for the upcoming big game or a movie night, so give him the biggest screen he can make with a projector. This ViewSonic projects at 800x600 DLP, contains a 3,000 ANSI lumens brightness and 15,000:1 contrast ratio.

This also makes a great group gift for family and friend gatherings. Imagine watching a Super Bowl Sunday game together extra large! You can project the game or any program onto a wall to enjoy together.
productList.imageAltText: GiftStarter ViewSonic PJD5134 SVGA DLP Projector
